C

com.amitinside.featureflags - package com.amitinside.featureflags
Provides API for managing feature instances

F

Feature - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags
A feature is defined by its name, description and flag denoting whether the feature is enabled.
Feature(String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class com.amitinside.featureflags.Feature
Constructor
FEATURE_NAME_PREFIX - Static variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Feature
The prefix of the feature name pattern
FeatureConfiguration - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags
A feature configuration is defined by its associated configuration PID and list of associated features.
FeatureConfiguration(String, List<Feature>) - Constructor for class com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureConfiguration
Constructor
FeatureManager - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags
The FeatureManager service is the application access point to the feature flags functionality.

G

getConfiguration(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Returns the known FeatureConfiguration instance FeatureConfiguration instances are known if they comprise features
getConfigurations() - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Retrieve all (known) FeatureConfiguration instances FeatureConfigurations are known if they comprise features
getDescription() - Method in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Feature
Returns the description of the feature
getFeature(String, String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Returns the feature registered under the specified configuration PID with the given name Feature instances are known if they are registered with OSGi configuration.
getFeatures() - Method in class com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureConfiguration
Returns the associated features
getFeatures(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Retrieve all (known) Feature instances registered under the provided configuration PID Features are known if they are configured with OSGi configuration under the specified configuration PID
getName() - Method in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Feature
Returns the name of the feature
getPid() - Method in class com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureConfiguration
Returns the configuration PID of the configuration

I

isEnabled() - Method in class com.amitinside.featureflags.Feature
Returns the flag of the feature that denotes whether the feature is enabled

U

updateFeature(String, String, boolean) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Updates the specified feature registered under the specified configuration PID
